title: Geography Questions Task
description: Answer geography questions using sequential execution mode

subtasks.title: Capital of France
subtasks.prompt: What is the capital of France? Please provide a brief answer including some key facts about the city.

subtasks.title: Measure Execution Time
subtasks.prompt: Please measure and report how long it took to answer the geography question.

title: Python Functions Generation
description: Generate Python functions using parallel execution mode

subtasks.title: Multiplication Function
subtasks.prompt: Write a Python function that multiplies two numbers. Include docstrings and type hints.

subtasks.title: Sum List Function
subtasks.prompt: Write a Python function that calculates the sum of all numbers in a list. Include docstrings and type hints.

subtasks.title: Measure Execution Time
subtasks.prompt: Please measure and report how long it took to generate both Python functions. Compare with sequential execution.

title: Apple Color Question
description: Answer a question about apple color using sequential execution mode

subtasks.title: Common Apple Color
subtasks.prompt: What is the most common color of an apple? Please provide a brief answer including some facts about different apple varieties and their colors.

subtasks.title: Measure Execution Time
subtasks.prompt: Please measure and report how long it took to answer the apple color question.

title: Mixed Mode Execution
description: Implement a mixed execution flow with both sequential and parallel tasks

subtasks.title: Generate Random List
subtasks.prompt: Generate a list of 10 random integers between 1 and 100. This is a sequential task.

subtasks.title: Calculate Sum
subtasks.prompt: Calculate the sum of the numbers generated in the previous task. This is a parallel task.

subtasks.title: Calculate Average
subtasks.prompt: Calculate the average of the numbers generated in the first task. This is a parallel task.

subtasks.title: Find Maximum
subtasks.prompt: Find the maximum value in the list of numbers generated in the first task. This is a parallel task.

subtasks.title: Create Report
subtasks.prompt: Create a report with all results from the previous tasks. Include the original list, sum, average, and maximum value. This is a sequential task.
